title: Beef and broccoli Thai noodle stir fry
ingredients: ['225g wide rice noodles', '100g bite size broccoli pieces', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon crushed garlic', '225g beef rib-eye steak, sliced thin', '120ml water', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '3 tablespoons oyster sauce', '3 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 egg']
